Asesoría en comercio internacional y ges: International trade and customs procedures advisory
Servicio de consulta e información de pr: We provide consultation and information services on processes related to customs regimes for the import/export of merchandise.
Son todos los servicios relacionados al: They are all services related to the process of customs regimes for the import/export of merchandise.
Dentro de los regímenes aduaneros podemo: Within the customs regimes we can find:
Internación temporal o admisión temporal: Temporary customs clearance or temporary admission without transformation, provisional admission with functional improvement and exoneration (law 4027).
Zona franca, mudanza y ley168: Free Trade Zone, moving, and Law168.
Servicio de declaración de mercancía par: Merchandise declaration service for importation to pay import duties (taxes and others) and local trade.
Servicio de declaración de mercancía y o: Merchandise declaration service and port operations for export.
Internación temporal o Admisión temporal: Temporary customs clearance or temporary admission without transformation
Servicio de declaración de mercancía que: Merchandise declaration service that allows entry to the country in order to fulfill a purpose, for a limited time.
Merchandise declaration service that allows entry into the country in order to be subjected to an improvement process.

The process that allows entry into the country, the merchandise declaration service, is subjected to a refinement process. The activities under refinement are transformation, assembly, assembly, adaptation, repair, restoration, and conditioning.
Servicio de gestión y trámite de benefic: Service of management and procedure of discharge benefit payment of import rights of merchandise through the resolution of the ministry of finance official gazette, laws that protect it.
Servicio de declaración de mercancía en: Merchandise declaration service in the legal regime that has the benefit of discharging payment of import duties, income tax, and other tax obligations.
Servicio de declaración de ajuares del h: Service of declaration of household goods and personal items with the application of partial benefits to Dominican citizens who are retired from abroad.
Servicio de gestión y trámite de benefic: Service of management and procedure of benefit of partial payment of import rights of vehicles of citizens who live abroad.
Servicio de declaración de mercancía que: Declaration service for non-nationalized exported merchandise.
Merchandise declaration service that allows the passage of said merchandise through the country toward its final destination.
Merchandise declaration service that allows the transfer of said merchandise from one local customs office to another. The transfer process accounts for any import duties.
Todas los servicios de declaraciones lle: All declaration services carry port operations at the same time unless the client does not request them.
Servicio de tramite y gestión de cambio: Processing service and management of the change of customs regime.
Fiscalización y conciliación ante la DGA: Control and conciliation before the DGA (General Directorate of Dominican Customs)
Servicio de representación de un importa: We offer representation for an importer before a control and conciliation process.
Trámite de permisos para importación y e: Processing of permits for import and export
Servicios de gestión y tramite de consen: Management services and processing of consents required for the import / export of merchandise.
Trámite de primera placa equipos y vehíc: Processing of first license plate for equipment and vehicles
Servicio de gestión y tramite de placa d: Management service and processing of nationalized vehicles and equipment license plates.
Traspaso de matrícula y placa de equipos: Transfer of license and equipment plate
Servicios de gestión y tramite de cesión: Management services and rights transfer from one natural/legal person to another.
